name: Technical Problems
description:
Hi!

This is a game i created for Beginner Game Jam #4

Also,  this is my first time using Krita for my game, so Feedback is appreciated!

Sorry if there's a glitchy sound when switching between scene in HTML5 build,  that's a bug i found after uploading :(

- Controls -

Esc : Pause

WASD : Move

Space : Action

- How to play -

Basically, you must complete 10 minigames, each minigame has different gameplay, but the control is still the same above.

You must complete the minigames in limited time, if the timer runs out before you complete a minigame, you'll lose a health. And you have 3 health before Game Over

- Story -

There's an unknown problem in Master Control Room, you and your team must fix it while a Game Show is starting.

Enjoy!
